/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and vehicles. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the vibrancy and energy of the city.
